intro: Reveal the secrets and find out who you can really trust!
description:
Immerse yourself in the fascinating story of Sally White, a young girl whose life turns upside down when she finds herself embroiled in a conspiracy by a mysterious organization. Who can you trust, and who is just pretending to be a friend?

The main feature of the game is the ability to change the appearance and outfits of the main character, creating a unique style that will reflect her character and mood.

Make fateful decisions, choosing from a variety of answer options, and determine what Sally's path will be - full of dangers, passion or betrayal.

Are you ready to reveal all the secrets and write your own story?

Game features:

• Freedom of choice - influence the development of the plot and relationships with characters.
• Image change - choose outfits and change the appearance of the main character.
• Fascinating story – immerse yourself in a world of secrets, intrigue and unexpected twists.
• Atmospheric music – a unique soundtrack will create complete immersion.
• Colorful graphics – stylish hand-drawn illustrations.
